TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit PreviousTrackingServiceAttribute extends System.Attribute
Public NotInheritable Class PreviousTrackingServiceAttribute Inherits Attribute
public ref class PreviousTrackingServiceAttribute sealed : Attribute

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("The System.Workflow.* types are deprecated. Instead, please use the new types from System.Activities.*")

summary.span: 指出前一版使用 的型別。

span.span: Indicates the type of the that was used prior to the current version.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/includes/deprecatedcontent-md.md)] 部署包含新版本 實作的組件時，此屬性會套用至追蹤類別的新版本，以識別前一版的組件。When an assembly containing a new version of a implementation is deployed, this attribute is applied to the new version of the tracking service class to identify the assembly of the previous version. 這可以讓執行階段運用較新的追蹤服務來處理在使用前一版追蹤服務時已保存，但在實作新版本之後繼續執行的工作流程。This allows the runtime to utilize the newer tracking service for workflows that were using persisted while using the previous version of the tracking service, but resumed after the new version was implemented.

span.span: A that contains a fully qualified assembly name that identifies the previous version of the tracking service.

summary.span: 取得此版本所取代之前一版追蹤服務的完整組件名稱。
